law.text: Any person who knowingly or willfully makes any false or fraudulent statement or representation in any record, report, or application to the council, department, or other agency of the Justice and Public Safety Cabinet under KRS 15.410 to 15.510 shall be fined not less than one hundred dollars ($100) nor more than five hundred dollars ($500), or imprisoned for not less than thirty (30) days nor more than ninety (90) days, or both.
law.history: Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 36, effective June 26, 2007. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. V, sec. 35. -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 71, sec. 12.
